mapper.update: CREATE TABLE TaurusHost (id INT NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), name VARCHAR(60), ip VARCHAR(60), poolID INT, PRIMARY KEY (id))
CREATE TABLE TaurusInstanceIDCounter (instanceID VARCHAR(50), counter INT, PRIMARY KEY (instanceID))
CREATE TABLE TaurusPool (id INT NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), name VARCHAR(100), creator VARCHAR(100), PRIMARY KEY (id))

CREATE TABLE TaurusTask (taskID VARCHAR(100), name VARCHAR(100), creator VARCHAR(100), dependencyExpr VARCHAR(200), addTime TIMESTAMP, lastScheduleTime TIMESTAMP, updateTime TIMESTAMP, crontab VARCHAR(100), status INT, allowMultiInstances INT, proxyUser VARCHAR(50), waitTimeout INT, executionTimeout INT, isAutoRetry INT, retryTimes INT, retryExpireTimeout INT, command VARCHAR(255), poolID INT, type VARCHAR(100),fileName VARCHAR(200), PRIMARY KEY (taskID))

CREATE TABLE TaurusTaskAttempt (attemptID VARCHAR(100), instanceID VARCHAR(100), taskID VARCHAR(100), startTime TIMESTAMP, endTime TIMESTAMP, scheduleTime TIMESTAMP, status INT, returnValue INT, execHost VARCHAR(100), PRIMARY KEY (attemptID))
CREATE TABLE TaurusTaskIDCounter (taskID VARCHAR(50), counter INT, PRIMARY KEY (taskID))
